FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

Instead of paying every month automatically, you purchase service credit when you need it. Your balance stays active for 90 days, and you only reload when you want to continue service.

Your service pauses but your phone number is reserved for 60 additional days. Simply reload within that window to reactivate your service and keep your number.

Yes! Any unused high-speed data from your current period carries over when you reload within the validity window. It's a great way to build up a data bank for heavy usage months.

It can be! If you're a light user or have inconsistent needs, pay as you go can save you money. Heavy users might prefer our monthly unlimited plans for better value.

Absolutely. You can switch to any of our monthly plans at any time through the Vouch Mobile app. Your number transfers seamlessly and any remaining balance converts to account credit.

The Vouch Mobile app shows your current balance, data usage, and days remaining in real-time. You can also set up alerts to notify you when your balance gets low.
